message:
Camlistore (Content-Addressable Multi-Layer Indexed Storage) is .... it's a ... you know, it's like a ....
It's really hard to describe it. It's a file system, document store, with sync, push, search, tagging, support for multiple devices/machines and a web UI.
It's a long video, but jump around to get an idea. It's built with GO by some Google people.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBCQq5hfsug
